34: Projectiles fired from this are given cosmic energy

36: The power of the cosmos courses through you.

Entries.AndyStrawberrySeeds: Heya @,^^Here's three bags of strawberry seeds. These ought to help you durin' your first season in the valley. Farmers gotta stick together these days.^^ -Andy %item object 745 3 %%
Entries.GuntherGift: Dear @,^^Enclosed is a portion of the funding we were recently awarded by the Regional Secretary of Artifacts. Thanks to your generous donations, the museum has become a major contributor to ongoing efforts to conserve Ferngill's cultural heritage. I hope these funds provide assistance in your future adventures.^^ -Gunther %item money 40000 40001 %%
Entries.AndyJojaCola: Heya @,^^I got lucky in a raffle and landed myself a lifetime supply of Joja cola! These'll help keep your energy up while you're working on the farm.^^  -Andy %item object 167 50 %%
Entries.AndyAncientSeeds: @,^Found these while I was foraging deep in the forest. Not exactly sure what they are, but I reckon you're better equipped to cultivate them than me. Lemme know what pops up if you get em growing.^^  -Andy %item object 114 5 %%
Entries.SusanIntroduction: Hello, @^^My name is Susan. Lewis told me you're a new farmer in town. I'm trapped on my farm in the mountains so I can't say hi in person! Hopefully the mess Joja made will be cleared out soon, because I'm going a little stir crazy. Can't wait to meet you and see how the farm is shaping up!^^  -Susan
Entries.SusanFertilzer: Hello @!,^^This is some of the best fertilizer I've made. Grow something delicious and share it with me!^^  -Susan %item object 369 20 %%
Entries.SusanMelonSeeds: @!^^My melons are growing like wildfire this year! Here's some extra seeds I got when I popped a number of them in my seedmaker. Don't go trying to compete with me for the melon market though... I'll win!^^  -Susan %item object 479 5 %%
Entries.VictorDewey: Dear @,^^I'm writing to thank you for listening to me in the graveyard. I know conversations like that can be stressful. If Dewey ever returns, I know he'll be just as happy to have you for a friend as I am.^^  Sincerley, Victor
Entries.OliviaWine: Dear @,^^The market went my way and I cashed out some of my shares for a huge windfall! To celebrate, I ordered a case of my favorite wine, and I wanted to share a few bottles with you. Let's have a glass together soon!^^  -Olivia %item object 348 5 %%
Entries.OliviaCellar: Dear @,^^I wanted to thank you for being such a sweetheart and listening to me the other day. I know I can get a little maudlin when I've had a few glasses. Next time we have a drink, I'll tell you about some of the marvelous places I've visited. It's easy to forget there's a world outside of the valley sometimes, but I have plenty of stories to share.^^  All my love, Olivia
Entries.AbigailJunimo: Hi @,^^I'm still processing what we talked about the other day. I've got more questions than answers. I can't believe that I'm not the only one. I know you won't, but please don't mention this to anyone. I think that this secret just has more secrets underneath it, and I'm not sure I'm ready to turn over all the rocks in my life. Let's talk more soon.^^  -Abby
Entries.GusSophia: Hi @,^^Just wanted to drop you a quick line to ask you not to mention what I told you to Sophia. I trust you to be discreet. It's important we're on the same page. Looking forward to seeing you at the saloon soon.^^  -Gus
Entries.HaleyTalk: @,^^Thanks for being kind the other day. I was totally freaking out and you were super patient. I talked to Emily and she's being super helpful and understanding too. I know I can be a  real brat sometimes. We should talk again soon.^^  -Haley
Entries.KentSummit: Hey @,^^Sorry again for getting so worked up the other day. I wanted to let you know I've started talking to a professional about this. Ever since I came back, I never know what'll set me off. It's time I get my life in order.^^  -Kent
Entries.PierreSVERebate: @,^^Thanks to you and the quality produce you've been shipping, my store's business is booming. Along with our regular rebates, I wanted to send you a special bonus. Thanks for being such a good customer and contributor to our small community. It's people like you who keep local businesses alive.^^  -Pierre %item money 2000 5001 %%
Entries.JojaRockslideNotice: To our valued JojaMart customers:^^Please be advised that the landslide blockage near the railroad will be cleared using explosives tomorrow morning. Avoid the area in case of falling rocks. Joja Co. is not responsible for any damage incurred to people or property in the vicinity.^^JojaMart: We Value Your Business
Entries.SVEadvertisement1: Dear resident:^^Our records indicate that you may not have a membership at JojaMart. Did you know that Joja has consistently scored top in the industry for quality and value? A membership may seem like a big investment, but it unlocks so much - it's a real lifechanger! Join today, and become part of the Joja family.^^JojaMart: We Value Your Business
Entries.SVEadvertisement2: Dear resident:^^In our time in STARDEW VALLEY, Joja has made an effort to become a contributing member of the community. But we can't do it without your help! If you choose to shop at Joja competitors such as PIERRE'S GENERAL STORE, you won't have the same assurance of quality and consistency. And without your business, we won't be able to afford to contribute as much as we'd like to local charities.^^^^Shop at JojaMart and help keep your community great!^^JojaMart: We Value Your Business
Entries.SVEadvertisement3: Is work stressing you out? Why not take a trip to the Fern Islands? The Islands are a bustling center of commerce, famous for ring fruit! Even those on a tight budget will find plenty to enjoy! From the sparkling-clean beaches to lush tropical forests, the Fern Islands are a natural oasis that appeals to beachgoers, birdwatchers, and appreciators of nature from all walks of life. Come chase your bliss on the Fern Islands!^^This advertisement paid for by the Fern Islands Bureau of Tourism.
Entries.SVEadvertisement4: Getting sick of watering crops? Upgraded tools still not doing the job? Running a farm is hard work. Consider hiring some farmhands to help! Especially in high-output seasons like the fall, having a few spare folks around can be invaluable for saving time. Plus, you help create jobs for your local community. Check your local bulletin board to see if anyone's looking for work!
Entries.SVEadvertisement5: ON SALE FOR A LIMITED TIME:^^Special yeast starter with nutrients designed to optimize wine fermentation from a quality-controlled yeast ranch. Has produced award-winning wine consistently since the strain was started almost twenty years ago. Inquiries welcome at Sunshine Vineyard.
Entries.SVEadvertisement6: Are you homebrewing beer? Fermenting your own grapes? Sick of your pricy liquids leaking or drying up in low-quality storage? Try hardwood barrels! They don't leak, they naturally repel liquids, and they're almost completely immune to temperature changes, so no more nasty cracks. Craft them yourself, or stop by Grampleton and pick some up from one of our many talented artisans!
Entries.robinKitchenLetter: Dear Farmer @,^^You might need some more space someday! That's where I can help. If you bring me some raw materials and pay a fee, I can expand your house. The first expansion I offer includes a kitchen. With a kitchen, you'll be able to cook any recipes you've learned!^^Anyway, I hope you're starting to feel at home in Stardew Valley!^^   Your local carpenter,^   Robin
Entries.JasThankYouLetter: To Farmer @,^^Aunt Marnie said I needed to write a thank you letter. So... thanks for finding me in the forest and taking me back home. I won't go that far in the forest again.^^  -Jas
Entries.winter_7: Dear @,^^Tomorrow we're all gathering by Andy's house and walking to the fishing spot in the forest for the Festival of Ice.^^It's a celebration of winter... there'll be snowmen, ice sculptures, and an ice fishing competition!^Arrive between 9 AM and 2 PM if you'd like to participate.^  -Mayor Lewis
Entries.OliviaDatingLetter: Dear @,^^I've been having feelings about our relationship we just started. I need to tell you some things. Can you visit me at my residence when you have a chance?^^  -Olivia
Entries.OliviaPartyLetter: Hi honey,^^I'm throwing a house party tonight at my residence. Most of the townsfolk will be there, along with my special guest: the governor!! I would absolutely love you to come, @. The party starts at 6:00PM. Don't be late!^^  -Your love, Olivia
Entries.MarlonLetterCherryBomb: @,^^The mines are dangerous. These cherry bombs will help during your expeditions.^^Be careful.^^   -Marlon %item object 286 5 %%
Entries.MarlonLetterCherryBombX: @,^^We received an extra shipment of supplies from Castle Village. I believe you can make good use of these. Good luck.^^  -Marlon %item object 286 10 %%
Entries.MarlonLetterBomb: @,^^Your assistance in monster eradication has been most helpful to our efforts in protecting the valley. These bombs will help you on your adventures. Stay safe.^^  -Marlon %item object 287 10 %%
Entries.MarlonLetterMegaBomb: @,^^The guild received another shipment of weapons from Castle Village. These bombs pack a punch. Don't stand too close to them once ignited.^^  -Marlon %item object 288 10 %%
Entries.MarlonLetterPotions: @,^^Camilla, the witch of Castle Village, supplied 30 elixers to the guild. This is one of her finest brews yet. I'm mailing you half of them. These will assist in your expeditions. Good luck.^^  -Marlon %item object 773 15 %%

Entries.marlon_event4: Yes, there are. The further down you go, the more monsters you'll encounter that have been...#$b#That have been corrupted for many years. It gives them supernatural strength.

Entries.1000012/t 1200 1700/f Penny 1750/k 38/w: spring_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 48 53 1 Penny 61 53 0 Pierre -150 -150 2/pause 300/viewport 61 53 true/skippable/pause 250/textAboveHead Penny "Timothy..."/move farmer 7 0 1 true/pause 3000/textAboveHead Penny "I should have done more..."/move farmer 4 0 1/pause 800/emote farmer 8/move Penny 0 0 3/emote Penny 16/pause 300/speak Penny "Good afternoon, @.$2"/pause 1100/question fork0 "#You look a bit down today.#I'm just strolling on by. Cya."/fork 1000012_EverythingAlright/pause 500/speak Penny "Farewell, @...$2"/pause 300/end position 83 53
Entries.1000012_EverythingAlright: pause 500/speak Penny "Sorry, I was lost in thought...$2"/pause 550/playSound doorClose/warp Pierre 44 57/move Pierre 0 1 2/move Pierre 4 0 0 true/pause 1000/move Penny 0 0 0/move Pierre 0 -8 3 true/move Pierre -2 0 0 true/pause 1000/emote Penny 28/pause 400/emote farmer 60/move Pierre -2 0 0 true/speak Penny "I was walking by the Jenkins' house and was hit by a memory from a long time ago.$2#$b#It was before you came to the valley.$3#$b#There used to be a family that lived here before the Jenkins moved in...$0#$b#They had a son named Timothy I used to tutor along with Jas and Vincent.$3"/pause 1000/move Penny 0 0 3/pause 1000/move Penny 0 0 2/pause 350/animate Penny false true 999999 23/pause 1000/speak Penny "Do you mind if we walk over to the bridge, @?$2"/pause 500/question fork1 "#Of course, Penny.#Sure, but it better be quick."/fork 1000012_WalkBridge/pause 500/speak Penny "I'll try to not take too much of your time.$2"/switchEvent 1000012_WalkBridge
Entries.1000012_WalkBridge: pause 500/speak Penny "Let's walk to the bridge.$2"/pause 500/stopAnimation Penny/pause 500/move Penny 7 0 2 true/pause 1200/move farmer 7 0 2 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 73 54 2/warp Penny 74 54 2/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection Penny 2/positionOffset farmer -5 25/stopMusic/pause 600/viewport 73 54 true/pause 1500/animate Penny false true 999999 23/pause 1200/playMusic echos/pause 1700/speak Penny "Timothy was a lovely child. He was passionate about learning and helping others. He, Jas, and Vincent were all good friends.$2#$b#One day, Timothy was late to his lessons at the library. He was... unusually quiet.$2#$b#Timothy was always so excited for class, I thought it was odd.$2"/pause 1100/emote Penny 28/pause 250/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 700/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/speak Penny "...Then I spotted bruises on his arm... and I... I immediately knew what had happened.$2"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 28/pause 300/speak Penny "I didn't know what to do... I kept teaching, until I couldn't hold it in anymore.$2#$b#I gave Jas and Vincent a special problem to work on, and I took Timothy off to the side behind the bookshelves.$2#$b#I asked where the bruises came from, and said anything he told me would stay between us.$2#$b#He burst into tears. His dad said he couldn't tell anyone what happened and that it was a secret.$2#$b#If he told someone, his dad would find out and Timothy would be hurt again.$2"/pause 1000/shake Penny 2000/pause 650/speak Penny "I wanted to march right over to Timothy's house and scream at his father for what he did.$5#$b#But... I knew that would just cause more problems, and maybe even put Timothy in danger.$2"/pause 400/emote Penny 28/pause 200/speak Penny "I finished the lesson for the day and walked the children home.$2#$b#I usually dropped Timothy off first since his house was the closest to the library, but this time I took Vincent and Jas home before him.$2"/pause 1250/speak Penny "After Jas and Vincent were safely home, I told Timothy I was going to help, and I promised that his father would never hurt him again. I promised on my life.$2"/pause 1500/speak Penny "I took Timothy to the mayor's house and explained what happened. Mayor Lewis was flabbergasted. He called the Zuzu City police and they sent a unit to Timothy's house.$2#$b#The police took his father away and took Timothy into protective custody.$2"/pause 2000/stopAnimation Penny/faceDirection Penny 3/pause 650/speak Penny "Their house went up for sale shortly after. I don't know what else happened to Timothy, his father, or his mother, Cindy.$2#$b#Wherever Timothy is... I hope he's doing okay...$2"/pause 1000/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 600/question fork1 "Do you think I did the right thing?#You did everything you could.#You should have stayed out of their family's business."/fork 1000012_BetterNow/pause 500/stopMusic/faceDirection Penny 3/pause 250/emote Penny 12/shake Penny 999999999/pause 700/speak Penny "You're saying you'd stand idly by as an innocent child was abused by his father!?$5#$b#You are ABSOLUTELY THE WORST! Get away from me, @!$5"/emote farmer 28/friendship Penny -1500/end dialogue Penny "You're utterly unbelievable.$5#$e#%Penny is ignoring you."
Entries.1000012_BetterNow: pause 700/faceDirection Penny 3/pause 500/speak Penny "Thank you, @.$0"/pause 1000/faceDirection Penny 0 0 2/pause 1000/faceDirection Penny 3/pause 800/speak Penny "I'm sorry. I didn't mean to hold you up for so long.$2#$b#I've had this on my mind for a while. I'm grateful you listened to me.$0"/pause 1000/speak Penny "I hope you enjoy the rest of your day.$2"/pause 700/move Penny 6 0 1 true/pause 400/friendship Penny 125/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000 true/pause 1000/end dialogue Penny "Hi, @.$0#$b#Umm...$2#$b#Please, keep what I said about Timothy to yourself. We could both get in trouble with the Zuzu City police...$2"

Entries.1000006/w rainy/f Shane 1750/z winter/t: rain/-500 -500/farmer 29 61 0 Shane 29 46 0/pause 300/viewport 29 46 true/skippable/textAboveHead Shane "...I'm not like that anymore."/move farmer 0 -13 0/emote farmer 8/pause 250/move Shane 0 0 2/pause 150/emote Shane 16/speak Shane "Hey. I didn't expect to see you here.$3"/pause 500/speak Shane "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 shane_event1#What are you doing by the tracks?#$r -1 0 shane_event2#Why are you up here by yourself?#$r -1 0 shane_event3#You look like you have a lot on your mind."/pause 1050/move Shane 0 0 0/pause 1300/speak Shane "Truthfully, the last time I came here, I was planning to jump in front of a train. I was more than ready to end it all.$3#$b#I felt like everything was falling apart around me, and the world was becoming... less real.$0#$b#Suicide seemed to be the only option left. It's hard to believe I felt that way not too long ago...$3"/pause 2000/speak Shane "I even spent time researching how to commit suicide by train... if you do it wrong, there's a chance you could just lose your legs and bleed out or be cut in half.$2#$b#Did you know that?$2"/pause 1700/speak Shane "I really believed I had nothing in my future, nothing to look forward to...$3"/pause 300/move Shane 0 0 2/pause 450/speak Shane "Ugh. I don't know what I was thinking, telling you that.$3#$b#Might have drank too much again. Still feeling that hangover.$2"/pause 1000/speak Shane "...$2"/pause 1000/move Shane 0 0 2/pause 800/shake Shane 700/pause 1100/speak Shane "I need to go drink some water. My head's starting to ache.$2"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/friendship Shane 25/pause 700/end position 29 48

Entries.1000021_Treat: pause 500/jump Jas/pause 1000/speak Jas "She gave me a Gotoro lollipop this time! I thought maybe they were evil, but Suki is nice. They're just like us.$3"/emote farmer 16/pause 600/playMusic echos/pause 1000/speak Jas "Why do we have to fight each other, @?$3"/pause 500/question fork1 "#War is complicated, but let's hope there will be peace again soon.#We'll finish the fight they started."/fork 1000021_GotoroFriends/pause 1000/stopMusic/speak Jas "...$2"/pause 500/shake Jas 1000/pause 1500/speed Jas 4/move Jas 0 3 1/move farmer 0 0 1/speed Jas 4/move Jas 16 0 1 true/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 200/shake Jas 3000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Jas -750/end dialogue Jas "...$2#$e#%Jas looks sad."
Entries.1000021_GotoroFriends: pause 700/speak Jas "...$3"/pause 850/speak Jas "That'd make me happy. I bet Suki would be happy too.$3#$b#I don't want anyone to be hurt. I want everyone to be friends.$0#$b#If I can be friends with Suki, maybe we can all make friends with the Gotoro Empire someday.$1"/pause 750/move Jas 0 2 1/move farmer 0 0 2/move Jas 2 0 0/pause 500/speak Jas "I'm going to go home and show Aunt Marnie this lollipop!$1#$b#You should visit Suki's cart. She has really rare stuff sometimes!$1"

Entries.1000018/f Jodi 2500/z spring/z fall/z wi: springtown/-500 -500/farmer 24 90 3 Jodi 13 90 0/pause 300/skippable/viewport 16 90 true/pause 250/playSound wateringCan/move farmer -5 0 3/playSound wateringCan/move farmer -4 0 3/pause 600/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 200/emote Jodi 16/pause 150/speak Jodi "Hello, @.$1#$b#Today's hot. Flowers need more water than usual in this heat.$1"/pause 600/move Jodi -1 0 0/pause 600/playSound wateringCan/pause 600/speak Jodi "Just watering away!$1"/pause 1000/playSound wateringCan/pause 900/emote Jodi 28/pause 700/question fork1 "#Walk away#Are you okay?"/fork 1000018_TalkToMe/pause 500/speak Jodi "...$2"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end position 29 82
Entries.1000018_TalkToMe: pause 500/stopMusic/pause 1200/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 800/speak Jodi "...$2#$b#It's Kent...$2#$b#I love him and I'm so glad he's finally home but...$2"/pause 1000/playMusic echos/pause 1100/speak Jodi "Ever since he got back, he just... he hasn't been the same person.$2#$b#He never laughs anymore. He won't talk to me. He practically ignores Vincent and Sam. He hardly eats any food. We haven't had-$2"/pause 200/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 250/emote Jodi 12/pause 600/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 450/speak Jodi "He's opened up a little about some of the horrors he experienced. The things he's seen. The friends he lost. What he went through when he was captured...$2#$b#Yesterday, Vincent was watching a cartoon and he accidently pushed a button on the remote and made the TV go static.$2#$b#Kent immediately fell to the floor and put his hands over his head...$2#$b#Later, he told me that at his base, the TV screens would go to static right before an alarm sounded. When they heard it, everyone knew they had to take cover.$2"/pause 200/emote Jodi 28/pause 200/speak Jodi "Harvey gave him some medicine that should help with the symptoms of PTSD.$2#$b#I can't tell if it's made a difference.$2"/pause 600/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 500/textAboveHead Jodi "*sniff*..."/shake Jodi 1000/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 700/speak Jodi "He's hurting so much, and I don't know how to help him, @. I feel helpless...$2"/pause 500/speak Jodi "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 jodi_event1#Kent needs you now more than ever.#$r -1 0 jodi_event2#You might want to look for a therapist in Zuzu or Pine-Mesa City."/pause 750/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 1000/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 600/speak Jodi "...$2#$b#I'm sorry, @. I had all of that bottled up, and I might have said too much.$2#$b#Thank you for listening to me. You, Olivia, and Caroline are my closest friends, and you're always there for me$2."/pause 1500/speak Jodi "I hope one day I can be there for you, too.$0"/pause 500/speak Jodi "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 jodi_event3#If you ever need anything, don't hesitate to ask.#$r -1 0 jodi_event4#With a combined effort, there's nothing you two can't accomplish."/pause 1700/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 500/speak Jodi "I'll follow the advice you gave me.$1"/pause 750/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 550/speak Jodi "I need to finish watering these flowers, okay? I'll talk to you later. Thank you again.$0"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Jodi "Thank you for talking to me earlier, @. I know what to do to help Kent. I think things will be better soon.$0"

Bye.$2"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogueWarpOut Kent "Sometimes I go to the summit just to think...$2#$b#It's nice to be alone every once in a while.$0"
Entries.1000022_AreYouOkay: pause 1000/move Kent 0 0 2/pause 800/speak Kent "Come stand next to me, @.$2"/pause 350/move Kent 0 0 0/pause 500/move farmer -1 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 0/pause 1500/speak Kent "Tell me. What do you know about the Gotoro Empire?$2"/pause 500/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 550/speak Kent "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 kent_event1#We are at war with them.#$r -1 0 kent_event2#The Gotoro Empire is our enemy.#$r -1 0 kent_event3#I don't know that much about them."/pause 850/move farmer 0 0 0/pause 1400/speak Kent "Well then. You don't know the Gotoro Empire like I do.$2"/pause 1000/speak Kent "The things I've seen.$2"/pause 1200/speak Kent "The things I've experienced.$2"/pause 500/stopMusic/pause 1000/speak Kent "The people who've died...$2"/pause 1650/speak Kent "So many good and innocent people...$2"/pause 1500/emote Kent 12/pause 500/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 700/shake Kent 1500/pause 800/speak Kent "!!!$3"/pause 500/shake Kent 25000/playMusic shaneTheme/emote farmer 16 true/pause 300/speak Kent "WE'VE KILLED SO MANY PEOPLE!!!$3#$b#COUNTLESS INNOCENT PEOPLE. AND OVER WHAT!!? TARIFFS!? BECAUSE COMPANIES ARE MAKING LESS MONEY!?$3#$b#HOW MANY OF OUR SOLDIERS HAVE DIED IN THE NAME OF CORPORATIONS!? GOOD MEN AND WOMEN!!!$3#$b#WE ARE NOTHING BUT PAWNS ON A CHESS BOARD FOR A FEW BILLIONAIRES!!! WE'RE BARELY HUMAN TO THEM!!$3"/pause 500/speak Kent "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 kent_event4#Say nothing#$r -1 0 kent_event5#There is-"/shake Kent 25000/speak Kent "ALL THE CITIES, TOWNS, AND VILLAGES WE BOMBED!!! ALL OF THE FAMILIES WE RIPPED APART!!!$3#$b#GOTORO CIVILIANS MURDERED!!!$3#$b#THERE WAS A FARMING VILLAGE LIKE STARDEW VALLEY! WE DESTROYED IT!!! WE KILLED THEM!!!!$3"/pause 500/speak Kent "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 kent_event6#Kent... Please. Let me-#$r -1 0 kent_event7#Say nothing"/speak Kent "I DIDN'T THINK ABOUT ANYONE BUT MYSELF!!!$3#$b#I ABANDONED MY COMRADES AND I WAS CAPTURED!!! I SHOULD HAVE DIED INSTEAD OF THEM!!$3#$b#WILLIAM! I'M SORRY!$3"/shake Kent 20000/pause 1000/speak Kent "THE TORTURE... THE SCREAMS... THE STARVATION... THE ISOLATION...$3"/shake Kent 6000/pause 2000/speak Kent "I... I...!!!!!!$3"/pause 500/question fork1 "#Kent! Listen to me!#I don't want to hear any of this."/fork 1000022_KentListen/shake Kent 3000/speak Kent "THEN LEAVE!!!$3"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Kent -100/end dialogue Kent "Hey, @. I... apologize about my outburst earlier at the summit.$2#$b#What happened in the war... it gets to me, sometimes. Please... don't tell Jodi, she'll just worry.$2#$b#Let's keep that between us. All right?$2"
Entries.1000022_KentListen: pause 1000/playMusic spring_day_ambient/pause 500/move Kent 0 0 3/pause 2000/speak Kent "...$2"/pause 1500/question fork1 "#It hurts me to see you like this.#You're scaring me..."/fork 1000022_ScaredAndConfused/stopMusic/pause 1200/speak Kent "...$2"/switchEvent 1000022_ScaredAndConfused
Entries.1000022_ScaredAndConfused: pause 2000/emote Kent 28/pause 300/speak Kent "I'm sorry about that outburst, @.$2"/pause 600/move Kent 0 0 2/pause 700/animate Kent false true 999999 16/pause 1100/playMusic echos/pause 1000/speak Kent "The doctors say I have severe PTSD... well, they're probably right.$2"/pause 1300/speak Kent "I haven't been the same since I left the valley. The person I used to be before all of this... I don't think he's coming back.$2#$b#I can't ever forgive the Gotoro Empire for torturing me and killing my friends.$2#$b#But people are people. Not everyone there is bad.$2#$b#The news stations here play us up as the good guys, and the war as good vs. evil.$2"/pause 1500/speak Kent "Truthfully? I think we're the bad guys.$2"/pause 2000/speak Kent "The amount of carnage and death we've brought to the Empire is unprecedented. And all with the wonders of modern technology.$2#$b#The destruction we've caused doesn't come close to what they did to us in the bombing of Jewel Inlet."/pause 1200/speak Kent "...I hope this war will be over soon.$2"/pause 1000/playMusic spring_day_ambient/pause 1250/stopAnimation Kent/pause 1250/move Kent 0 0 3/pause 1000/speak Kent "You know, I think you're a good person. Thanks for hearing me out. That kind of stuff is really taxing.$0#$b#I know it was shocking and hard on you. I sometimes...$0#$b#Just need someone to listen. I watch the news and they spread lies, my family doesn't understand... Having someone else helps tremendously.$2"/pause 1500/move Kent 0 0 2/pause 1500/move Kent 0 0 3/pause 1000/speak Kent "I need to spend some time with my wife and kids.$0"/pause 600/move Kent 0 1 2/move farmer 0 0 2/move Kent 0 3 2/pause 1100/emote Kent 40/pause 200/speak Kent "And please, keep everything you heard from me a secret, @.$0#$b#If my superiors ever got wind of this, there's a good chance they would lock me up.$2#$b#But I trust you.$2"/pause 500/emote farmer 36/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/mail KentSummit/pause 700/end dialogue Kent "Thanks for listening to me at the summit, @.$2#$b#Dealing with these issues can be impossible when you're alone. I'm glad I have close friends to count on.$1"

Entries.1000013_VisitingWizard: pause 1000/faceDirection Caroline 0/pause 300/emote Caroline 28/pause 1300/faceDirection Caroline 3/pause 1500/speak Caroline "I was...$2"/pause 2000/speak Caroline "I was visiting Rasmodius because of Abigail. Entries.1000013_KeepSecret: pause 700/speak Caroline "Thank you, @.$0"/pause 600/move Caroline 0 0 2/pause 900/move Caroline 0 0 1/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 750/speak Caroline "First, you need to understand Pierre and I have a complicated relationship, but I love him, and I always will.$2#$b#We got together when we were very young. Not long into our relationship, I caught Pierre fooling around with a girl in Grampleton.$2#$b#I was devastated when I found out. My naive self thought the appropriate response was to... get involved with someone else to get back at him.$2#$b#That other person...$2"/pause 1250/emote Caroline 28/pause 1000/speak Caroline "That other person was Rasmodius...$2"/emote farmer 16/pause 600/speak Caroline "Pierre and I had some horrible fights and... broke up. We got back together after a couple months.$2"/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 0/pause 250/emote Caroline 28/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 1100/speak Caroline "Soon after that, I found out I was pregnant. I... I didn't know if it was Rasmodius' or Pierre's.$2#$b#I never told Pierre I saw someone else, so he had no reason to suspect Abigail wasn't his.$2"/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 900/speak Caroline "Ever since Abigail dyed her hair purple several years ago, it's never faded. I thought that was very strange...$2#$b#Now my daughter is seeing magical creatures in the forest and taking an interest in fighting monsters...$2#$b#There's only one explanation. Abigail isn't my husband's daughter. Rasomodius is her father.$2"/emote farmer 16/pause 550/move Caroline 0 0 1/pause 1000/speak Caroline "I hadn't spoken to Rasmodius in so many years. What we had was a long, long time ago. He was surprised to find me at his doorstep.$2#$b#I told him about Abigail, and that she's his daughter. He said he had a feeling one of the residents here in Stardew Valley was his child.$2"/pause 1500/move Caroline 0 0 0/pause 250/emote Caroline 28/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Caroline "I... I cried so much. I felt horrible he was just now finding out he was a father.$2#$b#He brewed me some kind of potion to calm me down and explained what Junimos were, and why she is able to see them.$2#$b#He comforted me and gave me some advice.$2"/pause 1500/speak Caroline "...$2"/pause 2000/speak Caroline "I still don't know what I'm going to tell Pierre, or if I should tell him anything at all. And then there's Abigail...$2#$b#Rasmodius told me it's up to me to decide if she should know.$2#$b#I appreciate he isn't forcing me to say anything, or demanding I let him have a relationship with her. I... I feel horrible and guilty.$2"/pause 2250/move Caroline 0 0 1/pause 3000/speak Caroline "I will tell my family, but not now. In the meantime, you MUST not tell anyone about this, @. Please...$2"/pause 500/question fork1 "#I'm sorry you're going through all of this.#I'm going to tell Pierre and Abigail - they have a right to know."/fork 1000013_SwearGranpaGrave/pause 500/move Caroline 0 0 3/shake Caroline 9999999/emote Caroline 12/speak Caroline "!!!$3#$b#I TRUSTED YOU! YOU ARE THE WORST!$3"/emote farmer 28/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Caroline -2500/end dialogue Caroline "I see you haven't told Pierre and Abigail yet, so what are you waiting for exactly, @?$3#$e#%Caroline is ignoring you."
Entries.1000013_SwearGranpaGrave: pause 750/speak Caroline "...Thank you.$2"/pause 1500/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 750/speak Caroline "I... I know that's a lot to take in. As for my husband...$2"/pause 2000/emote Caroline 28/emote farmer 60/pause 650/speak Caroline "I don't know what his reaction will be. Entries.1000020_SophiasParents: pause 1000/speak Gus "Sophia's parents were...$2"/pause 650/playMusic echos/pause 1250/speak Gus "They were killed in a terrible car accident...$2#$b#It happened on I-63Z, south of Zuzu City. Entries.1000019/f Dwarf 2500/w sunny/z spring/z: winter_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 69 12 1 Dwarf 80 9 1/skippable/pause 1000/viewport 77 10 true/pause 250/move farmer 9 0 0/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 250/move farmer 0 -3 1/pause 1500/speak Dwarf "..."/pause 1800/speak Dwarf "The stars shine brightly tonight.#$b#They remind me of the luminous caves of Vataku, where a full moon brings with it the glow of a thousand moon stones."/pause 500/question fork0 "#What's Vataku?#Is that place your home?"/fork 1000019_Venture/switchEvent 1000019_Venture
Entries.1000019_Venture: pause 1000/speak Dwarf "..."/pause 1000/move Dwarf 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Dwarf "Yes. Vataku was my home. It's a long forgotten mine founded by my people - a large cave network that resides underneath the Cascadian Mountains.#$b#I hope to visit the mines again someday. I have many memories of my friends and family attached to those mines."/pause 1000/move Dwarf 0 0 1/pause 650/speak Dwarf "Less chance of a human discovering me if I leave the cave at night...#$b#Humans destroy what they don't understand."/pause 1000/move Dwarf 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Dwarf "But you aren't like other humans. I'm happy to call you 'friend'."/pause 900/speak Dwarf "Your kind does frighten me though. They are more threatening than the Shadow People.#$b#I hold my grudges against them, but the trouble they cause is nothing compared to the destructive potential of humans."/pause 1000/speak Dwarf "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 dwarf_event1#Why do humans frighten you?#$r -1 0 dwarf_event2#Why do you feel that way about humans?"/pause 1000/move Dwarf 0 0 1/pause 600/speak Dwarf "Human technology is terrifying."/pause 1000/speak Dwarf "Your race has devices that shoot tiny projectiles at lightning fast speeds, flying machines that spit fire...#$b#Indestructible moving metal boxes with horrifying weapons, and bombs that level cities in an instant."/pause 1000/move Dwarf 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Dwarf "Human technology is reaching a critical point where your race may be unable to fully control it.#$b#You use your gift of pattern recognition to create weapons of death. I fear these very weapons will end in the eradication of your race, just like the Elves.#$b#The Elves wiped themselves off the face of the world many hundreds of years ago. Their power, too, grew too great for them to control..."/pause 1000/move Dwarf -1 0 3/pause 1000/speak Dwarf "I see many similarities between Elves and humans."/pause 1000/speak Dwarf "With great power comes great responsibility."/pause 700/emote Dwarf 40/pause 300/speak Dwarf "But not all hope is forgotten. There are many humans who are like you, @.#$b#I have faith that the new generation of humans being born into this world will be wiser, kinder, and gentler than those who came before."/pause 1000/move Dwarf 0 0 2/pause 1000/emote Dwarf 40/pause 1400/move Dwarf 0 0 3/pause 1500/speak Dwarf "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 dwarf_event3#There is also a lot of good in us.#$r -1 0 dwarf_event4#I don't agree. You're misunderstanding us."/pause 1300/move Dwarf 1 0 1/pause 1500/speak Dwarf "I wish to watch the stars for a little longer before returning to my cave.#$b#You must be cold from standing out here for so long. You should return home."/pause 1200/speak Dwarf "Farwell, @."/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end position 40 20

Entries.1000005_Friends: pause 900/move Sebastian 0 0 1/pause 300/stopMusic/pause 1000/playMusic echos/pause 1200/speak Sebastian "I had a... horrible nightmare last night about my dad. Entries.1000001/f Alex 1750/k 911526/e 2481135/z: winter_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 29 57 0 Alex 20 57 1/pause 550/skippable/viewport 28 49 true/pause 250/textAboveHead Alex "Hey!"/pause 500/move farmer 0 0 3/move Alex 6 0 1/speak Alex "Hey there. Didn't expect to run into anyone.$1#$b#I come here to use the gym. They have better equipment than I have in my room!#$b#Not to mention there's a sauna to relax after a tough workout!$0"/pause 700/move Alex 1 0 1/pause 700/move Alex 0 0 2/pause 500/speak Alex "Remember when the entrance to this place was blocked off?$5#$b#Joja was moving some large crates off a train and one of the trucks slammed into the rocks, causing the rockslide.$2#$b#Joja sure did take their time fixing their mistake. Susan was isolated from Pelican Town for months and no one could get to her.$5"/pause 500/move Alex 0 0 1/pause 300/speak Alex "You may have heard a huge blast that almost felt like an earthquake pretty soon after you moved here.$2#$b#That was Joja using dynamite to blow up the rocks...$5"/pause 1000/move Alex 0 0 2/pause 750/move Alex 0 0 1/pause 700/speak Alex "So, what brings you here?"/speak Alex "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 alex_event1#I wanted to use the sauna.#$r -1 0 alex_event2#I wanted to say hi to Susan.#$r -1 0 alex_event3#I'm hiking up to the summit!"/pause 1000/move Alex 0 0 3/pause 800/emote Alex 28/stopMusic/pause 1000/speak Alex "You know... I didn't always work out every day.$2"/pause 700/playMusic desolate/pause 800/speak Alex "I told you about how I used to live with my father when I was younger. The living conditions were... harsh.$2"/pause 800/move Alex 0 0 1/pause 650/speak Alex "I used food to cope. At one point, I was eating over 4,000 calories a day. I was considered... obese.$2#$b#I knew what I was doing wasn't healthy. I would keep telling myself 'tomorrow is the day' or 'I'll work on it'. I'd exercise for a few days and just... give up.$5#$b#Days turned into weeks. Weeks turned into months. It was all talk, no action.$2"/pause 1000/speak Alex "Then one day, I finally had enough. I realized my dreams would never come true unless I took control of my own destiny. So I forced myself into a routine.$0#$b#It was really tough at first, but after a while, I started seeing results that made me want to keep pushing myself.$0#$b#I used to not be able to do a single pull up. Now? I can do thirty in a row.$1"/pause 800/speak Alex "You should chase your dreams too, no matter how much work it'll take, or how distant the goal is.#$b#You transformed an overgrown dump into a beautiful farm. That's huge, and I'm jealous of how much you've accomplished.$0"/pause 500/stopMusic/pause 800/speak Alex "Heh, sorry. I tend to rant about things sometimes.$1"/pause 500/question fork0 "#It was a lot of work. You've acheived a lot too.#You talk about yourself too much."/fork 1000001_Inspiring/pause 500/stopMusic/pause 1000/emote Alex 60/pause 500/speak Alex "Oh... Sorry, @. Uh... well, I'll see you around...$2"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Alex -500/end dialogue Alex "...Sorry about my rant earlier.$2"
Entries.1000001_Inspiring: pause 300/speak Alex "Thanks, @! I appreciate it. You've become a good friend - I knew I could trust you to listen.$1#$b#I'll let you get back to your day. See you around!"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Alex 50/end position 29 57

I don't know.#$r -1 0 demetrius_event6#Where does the name come from?"/pause 800/speak Demetrius "A thousand years ago, a huge meteor shower periodically bombarded this specific area of the Ferngill Republic.$0#$b#Of course, back then, the Republic didn't exist yet.$3#$b#The meteors were so plentiful that their trails looked like fibers stretched across the sky.$0#$b#The meteorites looked like tiny drops on the trails, like morning dew on a spiderweb. I didn't mean to keep you so long!$6#$b#I'll let you get back to whatever errands you were running. Entries.1000016_MoreAboutHim: pause 650/speak Evelyn "Of course, dear! It would be my pleasure."/pause 1000/emote Evelyn 40/pause 300/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 600/speak Evelyn "Richard was charismatic. He had an exceptional amount of integrity, generosity, empathy, and humility. In many ways, you two are very similar.$1#$b#When Richard first moved to the valley, Pelican Town had just begun to attract residents, and most of the region wasn't developed yet.$0#$b#The land was cheap, so he was able to purchase a large plot of land, that became the farm you inherited.$1"/pause 500/emote Evelyn 40/pause 250/speak Evelyn "Richard never raised any animals. He focused on cultivation. His farm was one of the largest and most bountiful in the Ferngill Republic!$0#$b#When he obtained enough funds, he had a greenhouse constructed on the property.$1#$b#He was overjoyed when it was finally finished. I remember him bringing us handfuls of fresh strawberries and blueberries in the dead of winter.$1#$b#Richard always wanted us to share in his happiness.$0"/pause 700/emote farmer 32/pause 800/speak Evelyn "He met his wife, Amy, here and they had a wonderful child, Jeremy - your father, dear. They were such a lovely family.$1#$b#Richard retired, oh, when he was about sixty, and moved to Pine-Mesa City.$0#$b#He wanted to pass down his farm to your father, but Jeremy had other dreams and wanted to follow his own path.$2#$b#Richard never sold the land. He paid for the land every year and kept the deed.$0"/pause 500/speak Evelyn "With no one taking care of the farm, nature eventually reclaimed the land. As you saw when you first arrived, it was completely abandoned.$2"/pause 1000/speak Evelyn "I didn't understand why he held onto the land until you arrived, and then I realized he never stopped thinking about the farm as a piece of his family.$1"/pause 1300/move Evelyn 0 0 0/pause 1200/move Evelyn 0 0 3/pause 1000/speak Evelyn "I'm glad you know more about Richard, dear. I understand you were just a child when he passed away.$0#$b#He was a remarkable person, and I see so much of him in you.$1"/pause 300/emote Evelyn 20/pause 1000/move Evelyn 0 0 0/pause 1200/speak Evelyn "I need to walk over to Pierre's to thank him again for this pumpkin. It's perfect for this haystack.$1"/pause 650/move Evelyn 0 0 3/pause 1000/speak Evelyn "Enjoy the rest of your day, sweetie.$1"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Evelyn "Your grandpa would truly be proud of your accomplishments.$0#$b#It brings me joy that you've brought his farm back to life after all these years.$1"

Entries.1000017/f George 2000/y 2/t 1200 1400/d: none/-500 -500/farmer 31 21 1 George 37 18 0/pause 500/viewport 42 18 true/pause 250/skippable/textAboveHead George "Yoba... please.."/move farmer 4 0 0/pause 700/emote farmer 8/pause 500/move farmer 0 -3 1/pause 1600/speak George "Hi, @. Entries.1000017_EverythingOkay: pause 1000/emote George 28/pause 1400/speak George "...I got bad news from Harvey.$2"/pause 800/move George 0 0 2/pause 500/playMusic echos/pause 500/animate George false true 999999 16/pause 1500/speak George "I've had more pain than usual in the mornings, but I didn't think it was a big deal.$2#$b#Evelyn forced me to visit the clinic a few days ago. They didn't take the news too well...$2#$b#Evelyn said we'll find the best surgeon in the Ferngill Republic to remove them.$2#$b#Harvey also recommended some specialists in Zuzu City.$2"/pause 1500/speak George "To tell you the truth, I'm scared, @.$2#$b#In times like these, I can only find solace in praying to Yoba.$2"/pause 1000/stopAnimation George/pause 650/move George 0 0 0/pause 1300/speak George "Yoba has helped me before when I asked for it. I'm confident Yoba will lend me the power to get through this.$0"/pause 200/question fork1 "#You have friends and family here to support you.#Praying won't make it better."/fork 1000017_GetThroughThis/pause 500/stopMusic/pause 600/shake George 1000/emote George 28/pause 500/move George 0 0 3/pause 500/speak George "...Leave.$2#$b#Talking to you will surely not help.$2"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship George -1000/end dialogue George "Don't dictate what I should and shouldn't believe in, @.$0#$b#Especially when I just told you I'm very sick...$2"
Entries.1000017_GetThroughThis: pause 500/speak George "We both know I haven't always been friendly in the past, but kind words mean a lot to me right now.$0"/pause 1000/emote George 28/pause 1000/speak George "I'm going to pray for a little longer.$2#$b#I appreciate you stopping by and talking with me.$2"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue George "I hate people pitying me, but I have no choice but to lean on friends and family now.$0"

Entries.1000025/f Linus 2500/z winter/z fall/y 3: spring_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 57 32 0 Linus 64 21 2/pause 400/skippable/viewport 63 23 true/pause 400/move farmer 0 -4 0/textAboveHead Linus "Good morning!"/move farmer 0 -5 0/move Linus 0 0 3/move farmer 0 -2 1/pause 600/move farmer 3 0 1/pause 200/speak Linus "It's a pleasure to see you, @.$1#$b#How's your morning?$0"/speak Linus "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 linus_event1#It's going well. How about yourself?#$r -1 0 linus_event2#I got some work done on my farm.#$r -1 0 linus_event3#I slept in and didn't do much."/pause 1500/move Linus 0 0 2/pause 1000/move farmer 2 0 1/pause 750/move farmer 0 0 2/pause 1250/speak Linus "We've been good friends for a long time, @. I'm happy you moved to Stardew Valley.$1#$b#Your farm, along with the others here in the valley, have had a huge impact on our community.$0#$b#It reminds me of the old days when your grandpa was running %farm Farm.$1"/pause 500/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 500/move farmer 0 0 2/pause 1100/emote Linus 40/pause 1050/speak Linus "I know so much about you, but you don't know much about me.$2#$b#I'm... protective of my past, but since we are such good friends...$2"/pause 750/move Linus 0 0 3/pause 500/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 1000/speak Linus "I'm open to telling you my story, @.$1"/pause 500/question fork0 "#I'd like to hear about where you come from.#No thanks. I thought I'd offer you my background because we've been friends for so long.$1"/pause 1000/move Linus 0 0 2/pause 2000/speak Linus "Well, I need to go back to my tent and gut the fish I caught.$0#$b#Goodbye, @.$1"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end position 62 21
Entries.1000025_HearYourPast: pause 1000/move Linus 0 0 2/pause 1750/move farmer 0 0 2/pause 750/emote Linus 40/pause 900/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 700/speak Linus "I moved into the valley some 30 years ago. I left everything I owned behind to connect with nature.$0#$b#My family was very wealthy. I was an only child. Money was never an issue and my parents gave me everything I ever wanted.$0#$b#I was... in a word, spoiled.$2"/pause 800/speak Linus "I mostly kept to myself. You could say I was an introvert. I didn't have anyone in my life I would consider a close friend.$0#$b#My parents... passed away when I was in my mid-twenties.$2"/pause 400/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 300/emote farmer 60/pause 300/speak Linus "I inherited their estate and their money. For a while, I used that money to travel around the world.$0#$b#I met so many wonderful people throughout my travels. I visited almost every major city you can think of, and many smaller places too.$1#$b#One of those places was Stardew Valley.$1"/pause 1000/speak Linus "There was... a magical feeling in the valley, as if it was calling to me.$0#$b#Of all the places I've been, only this one felt like home. I only expected to spend a week here...$1#$b#That week turned into months.$1#$b#The lush forests, mild weather, the sight of the mountains, the abundance of wild food to forage, the beauty of the shifting seasons...$1#$b#I knew I wanted to stay in the valley for the rest of my life.$1"/pause 1000/speak Linus "I donated the rest of my inheritance to many different charities and orphanages.$0#$b#If memory serves correctly, I believe it was around 3,000,000G.$1"/pause 400/emote farmer 16/pause 250/move Linus 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Linus "I thought that money would be better suited to people who needed it. The valley gives me everything I need. Money meant nothing to me.$0#$b#I learned how to live off the land, and to appreciate everything the natural world has to offer that we sometimes take for granted.$1"/pause 400/emote Linus 40/pause 150/speak Linus "I know deep down that my parents would be happy too. The money they worked so hard to earn was used to better the lives of thousands of others.$0#$b#And me? I've never been happier in my life.$1"/pause 1000/move Linus 0 0 2/pause 1000/move farmer 0 0 2/pause 500/playMusic spring_day_ambient/pause 2500/speak Linus "People are... quick to judge what they don't understand. Almost everyone thinks I'm a homeless bum.$2#$b#But you didn't assume that, @. You showed me compassion and kindness when we first met.$1"/pause 800/question fork1 "(I know what to say)#I never would have guessed you came from a rich family."/pause 1000/move Linus 0 0 3/pause 500/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 500/speak Linus "You never know who people truly are until you really get to know them.$1"/pause 650/emote farmer 32/pause 350/emote Linus 32/pause 1250/speak Linus "I need to go back to my tent and gut the fish I caught.$0#$b#It'll make for a good meal tonight.$1"/pause 1000/speak Linus "I'm happy we've become good friends over the years.$1#$b#I haven't told anyone about my past before.$0#$b#I trust you'll keep this between us.$1"/pause 1100/speak Linus "Take care, @.$1"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end position 62 21

Entries.1000032/f Willy 1250/z winter/z spring/z: ocean/-500 -500/farmer 24 35 1 Willy 37 35 2 Lewis 12 39 2 Marnie 13 39 2/skippable/showFrame Willy 25/viewport 37 36 true/pause 400/textAboveHead Willy "How incredible!"/move farmer 9 0 1/pause 800/showFrame Willy 24/pause 250/pause 500/move Willy 0 0 3/pause 350/speak Willy "Ahoy there, @.$0#$b#I just landed a real whopper!$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 700/speak Willy "Here, let me show you.$1"/pause 500/faceDirection Willy 2/pause 500/textAboveHead Lewis "I know how you feel, Marnie."/playSound openBox/pause 400/faceDirection Willy 3/pause 350/addObject 36 35 159/playSound fishSlap/pause 400/emote farmer 16/pause 500/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 400/speak Willy "This beauty is called a 'Crimsonfish'!$1#$b#They’re a rare species that’s disappearin’ from these parts, sadly.$0#$b#There’s a notion going around that they’re dying off on account of recent pollution from Joja.$2#$b#Since their factories started cropping up across the Ferngill Republic, Crimsonfish populations have dropped off.$2"/pause 900/removeSprite 36 35/playSound fishSlap/pause 500/faceDirection Willy 2/pause 400/playSound openBox/pause 250/playSound dropItemInWater/pause 200/faceDirection Willy 3/pause 500/speak Willy "I was just about to release her.$1#$b#I don't want to put these rare treasures in any more danger than they are already, even though I could make some good coin sellin' her.$2"/pause 1500/speak Willy "Sure am happy I’m able to show her to someone. People don’t always believe my fish stories.$1"/pause 1150/emote Willy 40/pause 600/speak Willy "It's times like these I feel like I should invest in purchasing a camera.$1"/pause 1000/faceDirection Willy 2/pause 1000/faceDirection Willy 3/pause 600/move Willy -1 0 3/pause 600/speak Willy "So...$0"/pause 50/speak Willy "$q -1 null#How's the fishin' life been treatin' ya?#$r -1 0 willy_event1#I'll fish every now and again.#$r -1 0 willy_event2#I fish at every opportunity I have.#$r -1 0 willy_event3#I haven't picked up my fishing rod in a while."/pause 1250/faceDirection Willy 2/pause 600/speak Willy "If you squint, you can just about see the Fern Islands across the ocean on a nice day like this.$0#$b#My family is from those islands. We should take a boat out there sometime!$1#$b#Away from the cities the water is crystal clear, and there are some amazing rare fish that are native to the islands.$1#$b#The ring fruit grown on the islands are also delicious! I've been craving a good ring fruit lately.$1"/pause 800/faceDirection Willy 3/pause 1000/speak Willy "I'm going to keep on anglin' and toss this Crimsonfish back so she can go on her way.$0#$b#Have a pleasant day, @.$1"/pause 600/move Willy 1 0 2/pause 600/showFrame Willy 24/pause 300/showFrame Willy 25/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Willy 50/end dialogue Willy "I released her back into the ocean.$1#$b#We all need to do our part to make sure we don't tip the balance of nature.$0"

Entries.alex_event1: Nice! The sauna is relaxing this time of year.$1
Entries.alex_event2: I sometimes run into her when I come to use the gym and sauna. She's always productive and busy.$1
Entries.alex_event3: Awesome! That sounds like a heck of a leg day!$1

Entries.elliott_event2: Ah, I see! I hope your catch is bountiful!$1
Entries.elliott_event3: We've all had those days, @. Spend some time in the sun and perhaps it will bring your mood up.$2
Entries.elliott_event4: Fantastic! It'll surely be a splendid time.$1
Entries.elliott_event5: Not a problem, @! The sea life isn't for everyone. Perhaps later we can spend some quality time together on land.$1

Entries.harvey_event2: Well, you won't be disappointed. They're top quality, made with all organic ingredients.$1

Entries.sam_event1: Yeah, no kidding it is. It's nice to hear we're both in the same boat.$1
Entries.sam_event2: Whoa! Get real. That's crazy! You're lucky you got that arcade machine. That's worth like... 15,000G at least!$8
Entries.sam_event3: Oh... well, that's all right. To each their own, I guess.$2

Entries.shane_event1: I guess I've been standing here for a while just thinking.$3
Entries.shane_event2: Why am I at the railroad? Just thinking...$3
Entries.shane_event3: Heh, nothing gets past you, does it?$3

Entries.abigail_event1: I thought I was the only one who could see them! This is crazy!$7
Entries.abigail_event2: I thought I was the only one who could see them! This is crazy!$7
Entries.abigail_event3: That's... that's a good idea.$2#$b#Sorry, I'm still trying to calm down. Ummm... let me think of a question.$0
Entries.abigail_event4: Umm... I do. let me think... oh, so...$6
Entries.abigail_event5: The Wizard told you? I've never met him...$9
Entries.abigail_event6: I see. Maybe I could look at that book sometime too.$0
Entries.abigail_event7: She is! Apples is very vocal. She's always excited to see me when I visit the forest.$1
Entries.abigail_event8: Umm... about a year ago, I think? I came to the forest to practice a song I was learning, and these little spirits confronted me.$6#$b#At first, I was scared. I thought they were going to hurt me... but Apples was the first Junimo to convey to me that they're peaceful.$0
Entries.abigail_event9: That's funny, you thought they were rats! I saw them as walking apples, which is how Apples got her nickname.$1
Entries.abigail_event10: Oh, that was a long time ago. It makes me wonder if I stumbled across them when I was younger too.$9#$b#Maybe I did... but I can't remember.$2
Entries.abigail_event11: I can't read the language...$2#$b#I've seen it, though.$6#$b#Apples has drawn symbols on the ground and pointed to stone slabs written in it.$0#$b#I knew she was trying to tell me something, but I couldn't understand...$2
Entries.abigail_event12: I did tell my mom and she was... shocked?$2#$b#She told me I have an overactive imagination and that I'm just seeing things. She doesn't take me seriously$9#$b#I also told Sebastian. He laughed at me.$3
Entries.abigail_event13: The Wizard? Interesting... I don't know that much about him.$6#$b#My mom always told me to not talk to him. She even forbids me to go near his tower. I never understood why...$2
Entries.abigail_event14: The Wizard? Interesting... I don't know that much about him.$6#$b#My mom always told me to not talk to him. She even forbids me to go near his tower. I never understood why...$2

Entries.emily_event1: Oh! This is our signature cocktail. Good choice, @!$1
Entries.emily_event2: You must really love your gin, @. The Lunar Horizon is strong!$1
Entries.emily_event3: The Rosette Nebula is one of my favorites! I'm happy you chose this one.$1
Entries.emily_event4: Oh my! The Big Bang is pretty strong.$6#$b#I'm sure you can handle it, though!$1
Entries.emily_event5: The Red Moon? This is Robin's favorite! Good choice, @.$1

Entries.clint_event1: I look up to you Adventurer Guild members. You keep everyone safe from monsters.$0
Entries.clint_event2: ...Yeah. I knew a couple of them. Fine adventurers with amazing skill.$2
Entries.clint_event3: I've hiked up there myself. Some of those adventurers had quite the kill count on their tombstones. They were fine people.$0

Entries.demetrius_event1: Robin told me she constructed some new buildings on your farm. I hope they're working out for you!$1
Entries.demetrius_event2: That's a smart idea! Automating the process should save you time!$1
Entries.demetrius_event3: I ran into Marlon recently and he told me you're an Adventurer's Guild member.$0#$b#You must show promise as a skilled swordsman!$1
Entries.demetrius_event5: Haha! You tried to guess at least, @.$1

Entries.dwarf_event3: Yes. There is good in your kind.
Entries.dwarf_event4: Perhaps... but it is still used in a way that causes death and destruction.

Entries.evelyn_event1: My day is well. It's a bit on the chilly side, though.$0
Entries.evelyn_event2: Be sure to wear several layers, sweetie! I wouldn't want you catching a cold.$0
Entries.evelyn_event3: That's unfortunate to hear, dear. I'm optimistic your day will brighten up.$0

Entries.gus_event1: She was here a moment ago. She left to run some errands though.$0
Entries.gus_event2: I see! I was just there. Willy is fishing on the dock right now.$1
Entries.gus_event3: Taking in the view of the Gem Sea, of course!$1
Entries.gus_event4: I always make the effort to visit Sophia when I have free time. She really appreciates it.$2
Entries.gus_event5: Hmm... that's why Sophia hates Joja.$2#$b#She... blames them for the death of her parents.$2

Entries.jodi_event1: ...Yes. You're right.$2#$b#I need to be supportive for Kent. We're in this together, and I need to do everything I can to help him.$2
Entries.jodi_event2: Thank you for the idea, @.$2#$b#I'll talk to Harvey about this. I'm sure he'll be happy to refer us to someone.$2

Entries.kent_event4: OUR NATION HAS COMMITTED COUNTLESS ATTROCITIES! WE'VE KILLED THOUSANDS!$3
Entries.kent_event5: OUR NATION HAS COMMITTED COUNTLESS ATTROCITIES! WE'VE KILLED THOUSANDS!$3
Entries.kent_event6: MY PLATOON WAS DECIMATED IN AN AMBUSH! I WAS A COWARD!!!$3
Entries.kent_event7: MY PLATOON WAS DECIMATED IN AN AMBUSH! I WAS A COWARD!!!$3

Entries.Jas_event11: I won't wander too far into the forest next time... I promise.$2

Entries.lewis_event1: Great!$1#$b#The residents of Pelican Town would truly appreciate it.$0#$b#You can get right to work on the field. I'll move these barrels and boxes out of the way soon.$1
Entries.lewis_event2: That's fine, @. My offer still stands if you feel differently at a later time.$0#$b#If you do have a change in mind, you can get right to work on the field.$0

Entries.linus_event1: I'm happy to hear that.$1#$b#I caught some fish this morning. Dinner tonight will be delicious.$0
Entries.linus_event2: Great to hear you're having a productive day.$1#$b#I caught some fish this morning. Dinner tonight will be delicious.$0
Entries.linus_event3: Haha, I see. Those days are certainly the best.$1#$b#I caught some fish this morning. Dinner tonight will be delicious.$0

Entries.marnie_event1: That's great to hear! I also get my seeds from Pierre.$1
Entries.marnie_event2: Aww, that's lovely, @. I'm happy you're treating them well.$1
Entries.marnie_event3: Oh, wow! That sounds like a lot of work, @!$1

Entries.vincent_event1: They do! I sometimes find some myself and sell 'em to Willy.$0#$b#He gives me enough to buy some ice cream or some games of Prairie King at the arcade.$1
Entries.vincent_event2: I like ocean creatures a lot! These tide pools allow me to get a good close look of all sorts of them!$0

Entries.willy_event1: Good to hear you're still enjoying fishing, @.$0#$b#I'm happy I gave you my old  rod to get you started!$1
Entries.willy_event2: That is marvelous to hear, @! I'm happy I gave you my old fishing rod to get you started!$1#$b#I never imagined you’d turn out to be such a skilled angler.$1
Entries.willy_event3: Sorry to hear it, @. Hopefully you'll pick up fishing again soon!$0

Entries.2481135/f Alex 1000/t 900 1600: sweet/-1000 -1000/farmer 44 65 1 Alex 50 68 1/skippable/viewport 53 67 true/pause 3000/speak Alex "That's a good boy, Dusty."/pause 2000/speak Alex "You might be the only one around here who understands me.$s#$b#No one else has seen the kind of stuff you and I have.$s"/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 700/emote Alex 28/playSound leafrustle/move farmer 6 0 2/pause 500/faceDirection Alex 0/jump Alex/pause 800/speak Alex "@! Did you overhear me talking?$7"/move farmer 0 1 2/question fork1 "#Yes, I heard everything.#Not really... why?"/fork didntHear/pause 500/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 1000/showFrame Alex 27/pause 600/playMusic desolate/emote Alex 28/speak Alex "I don't really like to talk about it, but I guess I'll explain...$s"/pause 1000/showFrame Alex 0 true/faceDirection Alex 0/pause 500/speak Alex "Have you ever wondered why I live with my grandparents?$s#$b#You see, my father wasn't a good guy... he... well, he ruined everything for me and my mom.$a#$b#Half the time he was gone... the other half he'd drink all night and tell me I'm worthless, that I'd never amount to anything.$a#$b#I think he resented me for being young... bitter because he'd wasted his youth doing nothing and had gotten nowhere in life."/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "Well... that's my take on it, anyway. Who knows what was going on in his mind.$a"/pause 800/speak Alex "One day he left, and soon after that Mom got sick and passed away. I had no choice but to move in with my grandparents.$s"/move farmer 0 1 1/pause 3000/emote Alex 40/faceDirection Alex 0/playMusic spring_day_ambient/speak Alex "You seem like someone I can trust... that's why I'm telling you this, @. I don't want any sympathy.$s#$b#If there's one good thing about my past, it's that it made me strong."/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 3000/speak Alex "I'm going to... think about some things for a bit, @.$2"/pause 1200/speak Alex "I'll catch you later.$0"/pause 600/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Action!$u"/pause 1500/speak Emily "I thought we had something special... I guess I was wrong.$s"/pause 500/speak Clint "I... I... Uh..."/emote Shane 12/playMusic playful/speak Shane "Cut!"/speak Clint "I'm sorry!$s"/faceDirection Clint 3/speak Clint "It's hard to remember my lines when her face is right in front of me like that...$s"/emote Emily 8 true/emote Shane 8/pause 500/showFrame Shane 17/pause 500/jump Shane/pause 800/speak Shane "Oh, hey."/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Shane "Check out my new camera...#$b#Joja Co. is having a video advertisement competition. The prize is 10,000g."/showFrame Shane 16/pause 500/emote Shane 16/showFrame Shane 17/pause 500/speak Shane "Hey! I want you to be in this shot... okay?#$b#Just walk by Clint and Emily in the background while they're talking... It'll give the scene a little more authenticity."/jump farmer/pause 800/move farmer 0 2 1 false/showFrame Shane 16/move farmer 8 0 0/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Shane "Okay... Ready?#$b#Action!$u"/playMusic sadpiano/speak Emily "I thought we had something special... You said you wouldn't leave me for anything. I guess that was a lie.$s"/move farmer 0 -8 2 true/pause 500/speak Clint "No! It's not like that... This is just something I have to do. It's very important to me."/playMusic none/faceDirection Clint 2/pause 1000/playMusic ragtime/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Clint "I've just got to try new 'Joja Bluu' cola.$5#$b#It's got three times the sorbitol for a thick, sweet blast. And it's cheaper than water!$5"/pause 600/speak Emily "But... But... Isn't soda unhealthy? You promised me...$s"/pause 600/speak Clint "Have no fear, my dear. The world-class science team at Joja Headquarters have determined that 'Joja Bluu' does not cause a significant erosion of the stomach lining. So you can drink it whenever you like, as much as you like.$5#$b#The real question is... 'When will YOU turn bluu?'... *glug* *glug*... Entries.2481135/f Alex 1000/sunny/t 900 1600: sweet/-1000 -1000/farmer 42 73 1 Alex 53 69 0 Caroline 45 60 1 Olivia 47 60 3 Pam 71 69 2 Evelyn 62 57 0/addTemporaryActor Dusty 16 32 -300 -300 2 true/positionOffset Alex -30 0/skippable/viewport 54 69 true/move farmer 12 0 0 true/pause 1000/speak Alex "That's a good boy, Dusty."/pause 300/playSound dog_pant/pause 150/playSound dog_pant true/speak Dusty "!!!$0"/pause 100/speak Alex "You might be the only one around here who understands me.$s#$b#No one else has seen the kind of stuff you and I have.$s"/pause 600/move farmer 0 -4 3/pause 300/faceDirection Alex 1/pause 180/jump Alex/pause 700/speak Alex "@! Did you overhear me talking?$7"/pause 1000/question fork1 "#Yes, I heard everything.#Not really... why?"/fork didntHear/switchEvent AlexFourHeart
Entries.didntHear: pause 400/pause 100/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "Oh... I was talking to Dusty.#$b#He and I have a lot in common, actually.$s"/switchEvent AlexFourHeart
Entries.AlexFourHeart: pause 500/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 1000/showFrame Alex 27/pause 600/playMusic desolate/emote Alex 28/speak Alex "I don't really like to talk about it, but I guess I'll explain...$s"/pause 1000/showFrame Alex 4 true/faceDirection Alex 1/pause 500/speak Alex "Have you ever wondered why I live with my grandparents?$s#$b#You see, my father wasn't a good guy... He... Well, he ruined everything for me and my mom.$a#$b#Half the time he was gone... The other half he'd drink all night and tell me I'm worthless, that I'd never amount to anything.$a#$b#I think he resented me for being young... Bitter because he'd wasted his youth doing nothing and had gotten nowhere in life."/faceDirection Alex 0/speak Alex "Well... that's my take on it, anyway. Who knows what was going on in his mind.$a"/pause 800/speak Alex "One day he left, and soon after that Mom got sick and passed away. I had no choice but to move in with my grandparents.$s"/pause 2000/emote Alex 40/faceDirection Alex 1/playMusic spring_day_ambient/speak Alex "You seem like someone I can trust... That's why I'm telling you this, @. I don't want any sympathy.$s#$b#If there's one good thing about my past, it's that it made me strong."/pause 500/speak Alex "Now... let me show you what Dusty will do for a barbecued steak.$h"/faceDirection Alex 0 0 0/pause 300/playSound dog_bark/pause 300/move farmer 0 0 0/pause 200/playSound dog_bark/speak Dusty "Bark!!!$1"/pause 400/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.584059/f Leah 2000/p Leah/n LeahInternet: breezy/-1000 -1000/farmer 7 9 0 Leah 12 9 2/skippable/viewport 11 9/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 2 0 1/pause 400/faceDirection Leah 3 true/pause 400/speak Leah "Hey! There's this 'Mr. K' that keeps buying all my sculptures.$7#$b#I guess it must be some rich guy who loves my stuff."/pause 500/playSound Pickup_Coin15/pause 300/jump Leah/emote Leah 16 true/pause 900/speak Leah "Wow! Entries.53/e 55/w sunny/t 1500 1700: none/-100 -100/farmer 28 57 1 Sophia 34 66 0 Andy 37 60 3 Olivia 30 65 0 Victor 29 65 0 Susan 27 63 1 Evelyn 37 58 3 Gus 30 56 2 Pam 31 56 2 Vincent 27 55 2 Jas 26 55 2 George 37 59 3 Leah 32 61 1 Shane 34 61 3 Robin 27 61 1 Demetrius 28 61 3 Emily 30 58 2 Clint 31 59 3 Harvey 34 57 2 Lewis 35 59 3 Marnie 35 58 3 Elliott 31 63 3 Maru 33 57 2 Sebastian 35 62 1 Abigail 35 63 1 Sam 36 61 2 Penny 37 62 3 Pierre 32 65 1 Caroline 33 65 3 Haley 28 59 1 Alex 28 58 1/specificTemporarySprite leahShow/skippable/animate LeahEx false true 100 4 5/viewport 33 60 true/move farmer 1 0 1/faceDirection Sebastian 2 true/faceDirection Alex 0 true/move farmer 1 0 1/faceDirection Sebastian 1 true/faceDirection Maru 3 true/move farmer 2 0 1/faceDirection Alex 1 true/faceDirection Maru 2 true/move farmer 0 1 2/faceDirection Shane 0 true/faceDirection Emily 2 true/move farmer 0 1 2/faceDirection Shane 3 true/move farmer 0 1 2/faceDirection Emily 0/move Shane 1 0 2/faceDirection Leah 0/speak Leah "@! Wish me luck!$l"/pause 300/faceDirection Leah 2/pause 800/faceDirection Leah 1/faceDirection Leah 2/faceDirection Leah 3/faceDirection Leah 2/speak Leah "Umm... Okay everyone!"/faceDirection Sebastian 3 true/faceDirection Emily 1/faceDirection Demetrius 1 true/faceDirection Elliott 0/faceDirection Pierre 0 true/faceDirection Caroline 0 true/faceDirection Shane 3/faceDirection Sam 3 true/faceDirection Abigail 3/speak Leah "Thanks for coming to my art show.$l"/faceDirection Leah 1/speak Leah "As some of you know, I came to this town because I wanted to draw inspiration from the beautiful surroundings."/faceDirection Leah 3/speak Leah "This place really feels like home now.$h#$b#Okay. I'm going to introduce my sculptures now."/playMusic jaunty/move Leah -3 0 0/faceDirection farmer 3 true/faceDirection Marnie 3 true/faceDirection Emily 3 true/faceDirection Demetrius 0/move Leah 0 -1 0/speak Leah "I haven't named this one, yet. I'll leave that for you to decide."/pause 1500/move Leah 0 1 2/faceDirection Demetrius 2 true/faceDirection Haley 2 true/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection Emily 2 true/faceDirection Clint 2 true/pause 500/speak Leah "This one's called 'Post-Dimensional Nullspace'. It represents the boundary of human imagination.$u#$b#The shape and color came to me vividly when I was in a 'trance state'."/pause 1500/move Leah 3 0 2/faceDirection Demetrius 1 true/move Leah 0 1 1/faceDirection Haley 1/speak Leah "I've been calling this one 'Egg Heads'. "/pause 1500/move Leah 0 -1 0/pause 300/faceDirection Leah 2/speak Leah "And the last one is called 'Wood Sculpture 3'. It's a celebration of my favorite sculpting material... wood."/faceDirection Leah 3/faceDirection Leah 1/faceDirection Leah 2/speak Leah "Well, those are my sculptures!$l#$b#Oh! One last thing."/faceDirection Leah 0/speak Leah "I'd like to say thanks to my special friend, @.#$b#He gave me the idea for this show and the courage to go through with it. I know that sounds cheesy, but it's true.^She gave me the idea for this show and the courage to go through with it. I know that sounds cheesy, but it's true."/faceDirection Emily 1/faceDirection Shane 3 true/faceDirection Haley 1/faceDirection Elliott 3/pause 400/speak Lewis "I'm proud of you, Leah! 'Post-Dimensional Nullspace' is my favorite.$h"/textAboveHead Robin "Great use of wood!"/speak Penny "Thanks for doing this!$h"/faceDirection Leah 1/emote Leah 32/faceDirection Leah 2/pause 600/speak Olivia "Exquisite art, Leah!$3"/pause 200/speak Leah "Thanks, everyone!$h"/faceDirection Leah 0/emote Leah 20/pause 500/speak Lewis "Now let's start the bidding on these wonderful art pieces... A marvelous addition to your home!$h#$b#Do I hear 5000g for the pink one?"/jump Demetrius/mail afterArtShow/viewport move 2 0 8000/pause 5000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Leah "Wow! I'm exhausted.#$b#My show was a real success, wasn't it?$h"
